remarks: Modus ponendo tollens 2, one of the "indemonstrables" in Stoic logic. Note that this uses exclusive-or ` \/_ ` .  See rule 2 on [Lopez-Astorga] p. 12 , rule 4 on [Sanford] p. 39 and rule A4 in [Hitchcock] p. 5 .  (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 3-Jul-2016.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 12-Nov-2017.)  (Proof shortened by BJ, 19-Apr-2019.)
statement:
mptxor.min $e |- ph $.
mptxor.maj $e |- ( ph \/_ ps ) $.
mptxor $p |- -. ps $.
